titleStmt.title: Le miracle du père Veron, ou, La messe trouvé dans l'ecriture
titleStmt.author: Jansse, Lucas, 1605-1686.
Derodon, David, ca. 1600-1664.

publicationStmt.publisher: Impr. D. Du Chemin Marchand Libraire,

notesStmt.note: "A satire in reference to a passage in François Veron's edition of the Louvain translation of the Bible"--Brit. Mus. Cat.
Also sometimes attributed to David Dérodon.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
